you activate windows with this commands:

Run the following in a command prompt with Admin rights:

For Win 8 Enterprise:
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato

@RMS043061: There seems to be no sign of an expiration on this activation method. You can use Windows Update, but make sure to choose and install the updates yourself. Microsoft may issue an update in the near future to patch the activation.

Thanks for the upload. Make sure time and timezone are set correctly before activation by kms method. Activated successfully with 91.149.135.121 as the kms server.

And yes Windows 8 is pretty good. Those of you who are obsessed with Aero Glass taken out, just count the huge number of other graphical advancements before you go further. Start menu / Metro / other UI changes just took me 2-3 mins to figure out so it is hardly an issue.

Now I hope some reliable activation trick is available by February when the 180 days period ends as these anonymous kms servers may be taken down anytime.

I successfully activated my W8 Enterprise by using the ff method:

Volume MAK Key for Enterprise VL
 PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C 

 How to activate your Windows 8 Pro/Enterprise:

 1. Run cmd as admin. Enter slmgr /ipk PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C (Only for Enterprise and Pro)
 2. Turn off your internet connection
 3. Open activation window and click "Activate". It'll show your an error.
 4. After that you'll see "Activate by phone" button.
 5.  i used united kingdom for the country, Call microsoft and enter code from message, which you will see.
 6. you should choose for business, If they ask about number of computer, where you will use this key, say 1

this should work and your w8 should be activated for good. goodluck!
